commands: exports.serverinvite = (message, settings, list, bot, botconfig) => {if (message.content.split(" ").length > 1) {if (!message.guild) return message.channel.send("Tiene que ser en un server para crear un invito");let args = message.content.split(" ");let channel = message.mentions.channels.first() || message.guild.channels.find("id", args[1]);if (channel == null) channel = message.guild.channels.find("name", args[1]);if (channel == null) return message.channel.send("Perdoneme, pero no puedo buscar este channel.");channel.createInvite().then((invite)=> {message.channel.send(`Aqui es un invito lien para entrar el server : \nhttps://discord.gg/${invite.code}`)})} else {message.channel.createInvite().then((invite)=> {message.channel.send(`Aqui es un invito lien para entrar el server : \nhttps://discord.gg/${invite.code}`)})}}

exports.roleinfo = (message, settings, list, bot, botconfig) => {let role = message.content.split(' ').splice(1).join(' ');if(!role) return message.reply('Please specify a role! You can either mention it or give its name');let gRole = message.mentions.roles.first() || message.guild.roles.find(`name`, role);if(!gRole) return message.reply('Couldn\'t find that role. Please mention a role or give me his precise name.');const status = {false: 'No',true: 'Yes'};let roleemebed = new Discord.RichEmbed().setColor('#00ff00').addField('Name', gRole.name, true).addField('Hex color', gRole.hexColor, true).addField('Members', gRole.members.size, true).addField('Position', gRole.position, true).addField('Hoisted', status[gRole.hoist], true).addField('Mentionable', status[gRole.mentionable], true);message.channel.send(roleemebed);}

exports.ping = (message, settings, list, bot, botconfig) => {message.channel.send('Ping-pong... Ping-pong... Pinging...') .then((msg) => {msg.edit(':clock2: Ping: ' + (Math.floor(Math.round(bot.ping))) + 'ms \nAsi, no soy el mas rapido bot te ha ever visto?')})};

exports.avatar = (message, settings, list, bot, botconfig) => {let user = message.mentions.users.first() || message.author;let embed = new Discord.RichEmbed().setImage(user.avatarURL).setColor('#275BF0');message.channel.send(embed);}
description: serverinvite
Serverinvite es una commanda para tener una invitacion por el server. Puedes escribir el nombre de un channel, su id, o mentionarle para tener un invitacion por esta channel
ping
Ping es una commanda para darte mi ping
roleinfo
roleinfo es una commanda que da informaciones sobre un role. Para selectionar un role, mentionle o da su appelido despues de la palabra `roleinfo`
avatar
Avatar es una commanda para ver tu avatar. Si quieres ver el avatar de un otro, solamente mentionle despues de la commanda

commands:
exports.purge = (message, settings, list, bot, botconfig) => {if(!message.member.hasPermission('MANAGE_MESSAGES')) return message.reply('Don't mess up with big things, little fella, they might fall on you :confused:');let deleteNumberstr = message.content.split(' ').slice(1);let deleteNumber = parseInt(deleteNumberstr, 10);if (!deleteNumber) {let prefix = settings.prefix;message.channel.send('This is the wrong way to delete a chat history :weary:
You should do : `' + prefix + 'purge [number of message to delete]`
Also, values under 1 are not accepted, *logic*');return;}if ((deleteNumber <= 0)||(deleteNumber>100)) message.channel.send('This is the wrong way to delete a chat history :weary:
You should choose a number between 1 and 100');else message.channel.bulkDelete(deleteNumber);}
description: purge
Purge is a command to delete a certain number of message. To use it, you need to give a number between 1 and 100 after the word `purge`

commands: exports.nota = (message, settings, list, bot, botconfig) =>  {let rated = message.mentions.members.first();if (rated) {rated = rated.user;let bool = false;botconfig.admins.forEach(id => {if (id == rated.id) bool = true;});if (bool) return message.channel.send(`Daria a **__${rated.username}__** facilamente un 11/10`);if (rated.id == message.author.id) return message.channel.send(`**${rated.username}**, te daria un 0/10! Boooouuuuuh `);let rate = Math.floor((Math.random() * 11));let phrases = ["un facil", "un grande", "solamente un", "quasi un", "facilement un", "completamente un"];let phrase = phrases[Math.floor((Math.random() * phrases.length))];return message.channel.send(`Daria a **__${rated.username}__** ${phrase} ${rate}/10`);};rated = message.content.split(" ").splice(1).join(" ");if (rated) {let rate = Math.floor((Math.random() * 11));let phrases = ["un facil", "un grande", "solamente un", "quasi un", "facilement un", "completamente un"];let phrase = phrases[Math.floor((Math.random() * phrases.length))];return message.channel.send(`Daria a **__${rated}__** ${phrase} ${rate}/10`);};return message.channel.send(`Pero, **${message.author.username}**, no voy a notar vosostros, nada. No soy tan mechanto.`);}

exports.broma = (message, settings, list, bot, botconfig) => {let args = message.content.toLowerCase().split(" ");if (args.length != 1) {switch (args[1]) {case 'mum':case 'mom':case 'mama':case 'yomamma':case 'madre':case 'maman':case 'mere':case 'mère':const yoMamma = require('yo-mamma').default;let insult = yoMamma();message.channel.send(insult);break;case 'geek':case 'informatique':case 'it':case 'tech':case 'techno':case 'computer':let geekjokes = ["What is the difference between an aircon and a computer?

||None, both stop working when you open windows||","There is 10 types of people in the world : 
Those who can count in binary and those who can't","What does a proud computer call his little son?

||A microchip off the old block.||","Why is beer never served at a math party?

||Because you can't drink and derive.||","How can you tell if a computer geek is an extrovert?

||They stare at your shoes when you talk instead of their own.||","What is the IT paradox?

||The warmer a computer becomes, the more it freezes.||","A programmer gets shopping instructions from his wife: Go buy a cauliflower. If they have oranges, get two dozens. He comes home with 24 cauliflowers.","A web designer is filling out a form:
Age: 31
Height: 5’9”
Eye color: #008000","If it weren’t for C, we’d all be programming in BASI and OBOL","An SQL statement walks into a bar and sees two tables. It approaches, and asks “may I join you?”","Why is it that programmers always confuse Halloween with Christmas?

||Because 31 OCT = 25 DEC.||","Two strings walk into a bar and sit down. The bartender says, “So what’ll it be?”nThe first string says, “I think I’ll have a beer quag fulk boorg jdk^CjfdLk jk3s d#f67howe%^U r89nvy~~owmc63^Dz x.xvcu”
“Please excuse my friend,” the second string says. “He isn’t null-terminated.”","A logician tells a colleague his wife just had a baby.
Is it a boy or a girl?
Yes.","What is the biggest lie in the entire universe?

||“I have read and agree to the Terms and Conditions.”||","The programmer got stuck in the shower because the instructions on the shampoo bottle said: Lather, Rinse, Repeat.","A programmer’s wife tells him, “While you’re at the grocery store, buy some eggs.” 
Since, he never came back.","In a world without fences and walls, who needs Gates and Windows?","Bugs come in through open Windows.","Windows isn’t a virus, viruses do something.","Mac users swear by their Mac, PC users swear at their PC.","Penguins love cold, they won't survive the sun.","If at first you don’t succeed; call it version 1.0.","I would love to change the world, but they won’t give me the source code.","Programming today is a race between software engineers striving to build bigger and better idiot-proof programs, and the Universe trying to produce bigger and better idiots. So far, the Universe is winning.","The more I C, the less I see.","My attitude isn’t bad. It’s in beta.","Programmers are tools for converting caffeine into code.","My software never has bugs. It just develops random features."];let arrlength = geekjokes.length;message.channel.send(geekjokes[Math.floor(Math.random() * arrlength)]);break;default:let jokes = ["What is the best thing about Switzerland?

||I don't know, but the flag is a big plus||","I invented a new word !!!
Plagiarism!","Did you heard about the mathematician who's afraid of negative numbers?
He'll stop at nothing to avoid them","A woman in labor suddenly shout, "Shouldn't! Couldn't! Didn't! Wouldn't! Can't!"

"Don't worry", says the Doc."Those are just contraction"","Knock knock
Who's there?
Interrupting cow
Interrupting c-
MOO!","How do you call a fish with no eyes?

||A fsh||","What do you call a can opener that doesn't work?

||A can't opener||"];let arrlength = jokes.length;message.channel.send(jokes[Math.floor(Math.random() * arrlength)]);break;}}else {let jokes = ["What is the best thing about Switzerland?

||I don't know, but the flag is a big plus||","I invented a new word !!!
Plagiarism!","Did you heard about the mathematician who's afraid of negative numbers?
He'll stop at nothing to avoid them","A woman in labor suddenly shout, "Shouldn't! Couldn't! Didn't! Wouldn't! Can't!"

"Don't worry", says the Doc."Those are just contraction"","Knock knock
Who's there?
Interrupting cow
Interrupting c-
MOO!","How do you call a fish with no eyes?

||A fsh||","What do you call a can opener that doesn't work?

||A can't opener||"];let arrlength = jokes.length;message.channel.send(jokes[Math.floor(Math.random() * arrlength)]);}}
description: nota
Nota es una commanda para notar alguien o quelqo choso. Para notar a alguien, mentionle. Para notar a quelqo choso, simplemente escribele despues de la palabra `nota`. Si no puse nada, vas a notarte.
broma
Broma es una commanda simple para tener bromas. Si quieres geek bromas o bromas sobre los madres, solamente escribe `madre`o `geek` despues de la palabra `broma`

commands: exports.dado = (message, settings, list, bot, botconfig) => {let arg = message.content.toLowerCase().split(" ");if (arg[1]) {let args = arg[1].split("d");if (args.length == 2) {if (!args[0].isNaN() && !args[1].isNaN()) {let transitNum = parseInt(args[0]);let transitDice = parseInt(args[1]);if (transitDice > 1 && transitDice < 101 && transitNum > 0 && transitNum < 21) {if (transitNum == 1) return message.channel.send( `Has hecho un .... ${Math.floor(Math.random() * transitDice) + 1}`)let resultArr = [];for (let i = 0; i < transitNum; i++) resultArr.push(Math.floor(Math.random() * transitDice) + 1);let result = resultArr.splice(0, transitNum - 1).join(", ").concat(" y ", resultArr[resultArr.length - 1])return message.channel.send("Has hecho un " + result);}else return message.channel.send("Lo sentimos, tus dados deben tener un máximo de 100, y debes lanzar un máximo de 20 dados a la vez");}else  return message.channel.send("Por favor ingrese números alrededor de su `d`");}else return message.channel.send("La descripción de sus dados debería verse como `XdY`, donde X e Y son números positivos.")}else return message.channel.send( `Has hecho un .... ${Math.floor(Math.random() * 6) + 1}`);}
description: dado
Dado es una commanda para tirar un dado. Si no quieres un dado de 6, puedes eligir tu dado con la formula de roleplay XdY, donde Y es tu dado y X es el nombre de dado que quieres tirar

commands: exports.morse = (message, settings, list, bot, botconfig) => {let args = message.content.split(" ").splice(1);if (!args.length) return message.channel.send('Por favor, escribe un mesaje a translatar. Si no, no es util.');let alpha = " ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ1234567890".split(""),morse = "/,.-,-...,-.-.,-..,.,..-.,--.,....,..,.---,-.-,.-..,--,-.,---,.--.,--.-,.-.,...,-,..-,...-,.--,-..-,-.--,--..,.----,..---,...--,....-,.....,-....,--...,---..,----.,-----".split(","),text = args.join(" ").toUpperCase();while (text.includes("Ä") || text.includes("Ö") || text.includes("Ü")) {text = text.replace("Ä","AE").replace("Ö","OE").replace("Ü","UE");}if (text.startsWith(".") || text.startsWith("-")) {text = text.split(" ");let length = text.length;for (i = 0; i < length; i++) {text[i] = alpha[morse.indexOf(text[i])];}text = text.join("");} else {text = text.split("");let length = text.length;for (i = 0; i < length; i++) {text [i] = morse[alpha.indexOf(text[i])];}text = text.join(" ");}return message.channel.send("```"+text+"```");}

exports.flip = (message, settings, list, bot, botconfig) => {const mapping = '¡"#$%⅋,)(*+\'-˙/0ƖᄅƐㄣϛ9ㄥ86:;<=>?@∀qƆpƎℲפHIſʞ˥WNOԀQɹS┴∩ΛMX⅄Z[/]^_`ɐqɔpǝɟƃɥᴉɾʞlɯuodbɹsʇnʌʍxʎz{|}~';const OFFSET = '!'.charCodeAt(0);let args = message.content.split(" ").splice(1);if (args.length < 1) return message.channel.send("Necesita escribir texto para flipirle!");message.channel.send(args.join(' ').split('').map(c => c.charCodeAt(0) - OFFSET).map(c => mapping[c] || ' ').reverse().join(''));}
description: morse
Morse es una commanda que traduce el mensaje que escribes despues de `morse` en morse.
flip
Flip es una commenda para renversar texto. Simplemente escribe `flip` y despues el texto que quieres renversar

commands: exports.helpa = (message, settings, list, bot, config) => {let text = message.content.split('').splice(settings.prefix.length).join('').split(' ');let embed = new Discord.RichEmbed().setColor(8212195);if (text[1]) {let abool = -1;list.forEach((bin, i) => {if (bin[0] == text[1]) abool = i});if (abool != -1) {embed.setTitle(`${settings.prefix}${list[abool][0]} - Description :`).setDescription(list[abool][1]);return message.channel.send(embed);};};let liststr = [];list.forEach(cmd => {liststr.push(cmd[0]);});embed.setTitle('Lista de todas las commandas disponiblas sobre el server :').setFooter(`The prefix of this server is ${settings.prefix}`).setDescription(liststr.join(', ')).addField('Como tener mas informaciones??', `Solamente escribe \`${settings.prefix}${text[0]} [la commanda que te quieres]\``);message.channel.send(embed)};
exports.sorry = (message, prefix) => {message.channel.send(`Perdoneme, pero no conoce esta commenda. Puedes escribir ${prefix}helpa para ver la lista de las commandas`)}

exports.invite = (message, settings, list, bot, botconfig) => {message.channel.send('Aqui es un link para invitar me en tu server :smile:
https://discordapp.com/oauth2/authorize?client_id=592760920648712192&scope=bot&permissions=2146958847')}
description: helpa
Helpa es una commanda para tener helpa sobre este bot. Si quieres mas informaciones sobre una commanda, siempre escribe `helpa` y despues, el nombre de tu commanda
invite
Invite es una commanda para tener el link para invitarme en tu server

commands: exports.serveurinvite = (message, settings, list, bot, botconfig) => {if (message.content.split(" ").length > 1) {if (!message.guild) return message.channel.send("Vous devez être dans une guilde pour créer une invitation");let args = message.content.split(" ");let channel = message.mentions.channels.first() || message.guild.channels.find("id", args[1]);if (channel == null) channel = message.guild.channels.find("name", args[1]);if (channel == null) return message.channel.send("Désolé, mais je ne trouve pas cette channel.");channel.createInvite().then((invite)=> {message.channel.send(`Voici un lien d'invitation pour ce channel : \nhttps://discord.gg/${invite.code}`)})} else {message.channel.createInvite().then((invite)=> {message.channel.send(`Voici un lien d'invitation pour ce channel : \nhttps://discord.gg/${invite.code}`)})}}

exports.inforole = (message, settings, list, bot, botconfig) => {let role = message.content.split(' ').splice(1).join(' ');if(!role) return message.reply('S\'il vous plait veuillez choisir un role. Vous pouvez soit le mentionner soit ecrire son nom');let gRole = message.mentions.roles.first() || message.guild.roles.find(`name`, role);if(!gRole) return message.reply('Je n\'ai pas trouvé le role. Veuillez soit mentionner le role, soit donner son nom précis.');const status = {false: 'Non',true: 'Oui'};let roleemebed = new Discord.RichEmbed().setColor('#00ff00').addField('Nom', gRole.name, true).addField('Couleur hex', gRole.hexColor, true).addField('Membres', gRole.members.size, true).addField('Position', gRole.position, true).addField('Hissé', status[gRole.hoist], true).addField('Mentionnable', status[gRole.mentionable], true);message.channel.send(roleemebed);}

exports.ping = (message, settings, list, bot, botconfig) => {message.channel.send('Ping-pong... Ping-pong... Pinging...') .then((msg) => {msg.edit(':clock2: Ping: ' + (Math.floor(Math.round(bot.ping))) + 'ms \nAlors, ne suis-je pas le bot le plus rapide que tu es jamais vu?')})};

exports.avatar = (message, settings, list, bot, botconfig) => {let user = message.mentions.users.first() || message.author;let embed = new Discord.RichEmbed().setImage(user.avatarURL).setColor('#275BF0');message.channel.send(embed);}
description: serveurinvite

Serveurinvite est une commande pour créer un lien d'invitation vers ce serveur. Par défaut, le lien dirige vers la channel où est écrit la commande, mais on peut choisir la channel en la mentionnant, écrivant son prénom ou son ID.
ping
Ping est une commande assez simple pour vous donner mon ping
inforole
inforole est une commande qui permet de recevoir des informations sur un certain role. Pour utiliser la commande, veuillez entrer le nom du role ou le mentionner apres le mot `inforole`
avatar
Avatar est une commande pour pouvoir voir votre avatar. Si vous voulez voir l'avatar de quelqu'un d'autre, mentionnez le simplement.

commands:
exports.purge = (message, settings, list, bot, botconfig) => {if(!message.member.hasPermission('MANAGE_MESSAGES')) return message.reply('Ne touche pas à ça, petit, c'est pour les grands :confused:');let deleteNumberstr = message.content.split(' ').slice(1);let deleteNumber = parseInt(deleteNumberstr, 10);if (!deleteNumber) {let prefix = settings.prefix;message.channel.send('Ce n'est pas la bonne méthode pour purger une channel :weary:
Tu devrais faire : `' + prefix + 'purge [nombre de messages à sup]`
Aussi, les valeurs en dessous de 0 sont refusées, *logique*');return;}if ((deleteNumber <= 0)||(deleteNumber>100)) message.channel.send('Ceci n'est pas la bonne méthode pour purger une channel :weary:
Tu doit choisir un nombre entre 1 et 100');else message.channel.bulkDelete(deleteNumber);}
description: purge

Purge est une commande pour supprimer un grand nombre de messages. Pour l'utiliser, vous devez écrire un nombre entre 1 et 100 après le mot `purge`, qui correspondra donc au nombre de messages supprimés

Je ne suis pas si méchant.`);}

description: note

Note est une commande qui permet de noter quelqu'un ou quelque chose. Pour noter quelqu'un, veuillez le mentionner. Pour noter quelque chose, veuillez écrire quelque chose après le mot `note`. Par défaut, si vous ne me donnez aucun arguments, je vous noterais.
blague

Blague est une commande simple pour avoir des blagues. Si vous voulez avoir des blagues de geek ou des blagues sur les mamans, veuillez préciser le mot `geek` ou `maman` après le mot `blague`. Attention : Les blagues n'ayant pas encore était traduite, toute les blagues sont pour le moment en anglais.

commands: exports.dés = (message, settings, list, bot, botconfig) => {let arg = message.content.toLowerCase().split(" ");if (arg[1]) {let args = arg[1].split("d");if (args.length == 2) {if (!args[0].isNaN() && !args[1].isNaN()) {let transitNum = parseInt(args[0]);let transitDice = parseInt(args[1]);if (transitDice > 1 && transitDice < 101 && transitNum > 0 && transitNum < 21) {if (transitNum == 1) return message.channel.send( `Vous avez fait un .... ${Math.floor(Math.random() * transitDice) + 1}`)let resultArr = [];for (let i = 0; i < transitNum; i++) resultArr.push(Math.floor(Math.random() * transitDice) + 1);let result = resultArr.splice(0, transitNum - 1).join(", ").concat(" et ", resultArr[resultArr.length - 1]);return message.channel.send("Vous avez fait un " + result);}else return message.channel.send("Désolé, vous devez avoir un dés entre 1 et 100. Par ailleurs, il doit y avoir un maximumd de 20 dés lancés en même temps.");}else  return message.channel.send("Veuillez entrer des nombres autours de `d`");}else return message.channel.send("La description du dés devrait ressembler à `XdY`, où X et Y sont des nombres positifs.")}else return message.channel.send( `Vous avez fait un .... ${Math.floor(Math.random() * 6) + 1}`);}

exports.des = (message, settings, list, bot, botconfig) => {let arg = message.content.toLowerCase().split(" ");if (arg[1]) {let args = arg[1].split("d");if (args.length == 2) {if (!args[0].isNaN() && !args[1].isNaN()) {let transitNum = parseInt(args[0]);let transitDice = parseInt(args[1]);if (transitDice > 1 && transitDice < 101 && transitNum > 0 && transitNum < 21) {if (transitNum == 1) return message.channel.send( `Vous avez fait un .... ${Math.floor(Math.random() * transitDice) + 1}`)let resultArr = [];for (let i = 0; i < transitNum; i++) resultArr.push(Math.floor(Math.random() * transitDice) + 1);let result = resultArr.splice(0, transitNum - 1).join(", ").concat(" et ", resultArr[resultArr.length - 1]);return message.channel.send("Vous avez fait un " + result);}else return message.channel.send("Désolé, vous devez avoir un dés entre 1 et 100. Par ailleurs, il doit y avoir un maximumd de 20 dés lancés en même temps.");}else  return message.channel.send("Veuillez entrer des nombres autours de `d`");}else return message.channel.send("La description du dés devrait ressembler à `XdY`, où X et Y sont des nombres positifs.")}else return message.channel.send( `Vous avez fait un .... ${Math.floor(Math.random() * 6) + 1}`);}
description: dés

Dés (aussi écrivible 'des') est une commande pour lancer un dés. Si vous ne voulez pas lancer un simple dés 6, veuillez préciser votre dés après le mot `dés`, en écrivant XdY, où X est le nombre de dés à lancer, et y le nombre de faces qu'a chaque dés.

commands: exports.morse = (message, settings, list, bot, botconfig) => {let args = message.content.split(" ").splice(1);if (!args.length) return message.channel.send('Veuillez entrer un message à traduire, sinon cela devient inutile.');let alpha = " ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ1234567890".split(""),morse = "/,.-,-...,-.-.,-..,.,..-.,--.,....,..,.---,-.-,.-..,--,-.,---,.--.,--.-,.-.,...,-,..-,...-,.--,-..-,-.--,--..,.----,..---,...--,....-,.....,-....,--...,---..,----.,-----".split(","),text = args.join(" ").toUpperCase();while (text.includes("Ä") || text.includes("Ö") || text.includes("Ü")) {text = text.replace("Ä","AE").replace("Ö","OE").replace("Ü","UE");}if (text.startsWith(".") || text.startsWith("-")) {text = text.split(" ");let length = text.length;for (i = 0; i < length; i++) {text[i] = alpha[morse.indexOf(text[i])];}text = text.join("");} else {text = text.split("");let length = text.length;for (i = 0; i < length; i++) {text [i] = morse[alpha.indexOf(text[i])];}text = text.join(" ");}return message.channel.send("```"+text+"```");}

exports.flip = (message, settings, list, bot, botconfig) => {const mapping = '¡"#$%⅋,)(*+\'-˙/0ƖᄅƐㄣϛ9ㄥ86:;<=>?@∀qƆpƎℲפHIſʞ˥WNOԀQɹS┴∩ΛMX⅄Z[/]^_`ɐqɔpǝɟƃɥᴉɾʞlɯuodbɹsʇnʌʍxʎz{|}~';const OFFSET = '!'.charCodeAt(0);let args = message.content.split(" ").splice(1);if (args.length < 1) return message.channel.send("Vous devez mettre du texte pour le renverser!");message.channel.send(args.join(' ').split('').map(c => c.charCodeAt(0) - OFFSET).map(c => mapping[c] || ' ').reverse().join(''));}
description: morse
Morse est une commande qui permet de traduire en morse le message que vous mettrez après le mot `morse`
flip
Flip est une commande pour renverser du texte. Pour l'utiliser, vous devez simplement écrire votre texte à renverser suivant le mot `flip`

commands: exports.aide = (message, settings, list, bot, config) => {let text = message.content.split('').splice(settings.prefix.length).join('').split(' ');let embed = new Discord.RichEmbed().setColor(8212195);if (text[1]) {let abool = -1;list.forEach((bin, i) => {if (bin[0] == text[1]) abool = i});if (abool != -1) {embed.setTitle(`${settings.prefix}${list[abool][0]} - Description :`).setDescription(list[abool][1]);return message.channel.send(embed);};};let liststr = [];list.forEach(cmd => {liststr.push(cmd[0]);});embed.setTitle('Liste de toute les commandes disponibles sur ce serveur :').setFooter(`Le prefix de ce serveur est ${settings.prefix}`).setDescription(liststr.join(', ')).addField('Comment avoir des informations plus spécifiques?', `Ecrivez juste \`${settings.prefix}${text[0]} [La commande qui vous intrigue]\``);message.channel.send(embed)};
exports.sorry = (message, prefix) => {message.channel.send(`Excusez moi, mais je ne connais pas cette commande. Veuillez écrire ${prefix}aide pour voir la liste des commandes.`)}

exports.invite = (message, settings, list, bot, botconfig) => {message.channel.send('Voici un lien pour que tu puisse m\'inviter sur ton serveur :smile:
https://discordapp.com/oauth2/authorize?client_id=592760920648712192&scope=bot&permissions=2146958847')}
description: invite
Invite est une commande pour que vous puissiez m'inviter sur votre serveur
aide
Aide est une commande pour vous aider à utiliser ce bot. Ecrivez `aide` suivit de la commande qui vous intrigue pour connaitre à quoi sert cette commande.

commands: exports.serverinvite = (message, settings, list, bot, botconfig) => {if (message.content.split(" ").length > 1) {if (!message.guild) return message.channel.send("You must be in a guild to create an invite link.");let args = message.content.split(" ");let channel = message.mentions.channels.first() || message.guild.channels.find("id", args[1]);if (channel == null) channel = message.guild.channels.find("name", args[1]);if (channel == null) return message.channel.send("I can't seem to find this channel, sorry.");channel.createInvite().then((invite)=> {message.channel.send(`Here is an invite link for this channel : \nhttps://discord.gg/${invite.code}`)})} else {message.channel.createInvite().then((invite)=> {message.channel.send(`Here is an invite link for this channel : \nhttps://discord.gg/${invite.code}`)})}}

exports.avatar = (message, settings, list, bot, botconfig) => {let user = message.mentions.users.first() || message.author;let embed = new Discord.RichEmbed().setImage(user.avatarURL).setColor('#275BF0');message.channel.send(embed);}

exports.roleinfo = (message, settings, list, bot, botconfig) => {let role = message.content.split(' ').splice(1).join(' ');if(!role) return message.reply('Please specify a role! You can either mention it or give its name');let gRole = message.mentions.roles.first() || message.guild.roles.find(`name`, role);if(!gRole) return message.reply('Couldn\'t find that role. Please mention a role or give me his precise name.');const status = {false: 'No',true: 'Yes'};let roleemebed = new Discord.RichEmbed().setColor('#00ff00').addField('Name', gRole.name, true).addField('Hex color', gRole.hexColor, true).addField('Members', gRole.members.size, true).addField('Position', gRole.position, true).addField('Hoisted', status[gRole.hoist], true).addField('Mentionable', status[gRole.mentionable], true);message.channel.send(roleemebed);}

exports.ping = (message, settings, list, bot, botconfig) => {message.channel.send('Ping-pong... Ping-pong... Pinging...') .then((msg) => {msg.edit(':clock2: Ping: ' + (Math.floor(Math.round(bot.ping))) + 'ms \nSo, am I not the fastest bot you\'ve ever seen?')})};
description: serverinvite

Serverinvite is a simple command to get an invite link for your server. If you want it for a specific channel, just mention the channel or write its name or id. The default redirect channel will be the one the command as been writted in.
avatar
Avatar is a command to see your avatar. If you want to see someone else's avatar, you just have to mention him
ping
Ping is a simple command to give my ping
roleinfo
roleinfo is a command to get informations about a role. To specify the role, just mention it or write his name

commands:
exports.purge = (message, settings, list, bot, botconfig) => {if(!message.member.hasPermission('MANAGE_MESSAGES')) return message.reply('Don't mess up with big things, little fella, they might fall on you :confused:');let deleteNumberstr = message.content.split(' ').slice(1);let deleteNumber = parseInt(deleteNumberstr, 10);if (!deleteNumber) {let prefix = settings.prefix;message.channel.send('This is the wrong way to delete a chat history :weary:
You should do : `' + prefix + 'purge [number of message to delete]`
Also, values under 1 are not accepted, *logic*');return;}if ((deleteNumber <= 0)||(deleteNumber>100)) message.channel.send('This is the wrong way to delete a chat history :weary:
You should choose a number between 1 and 100');else message.channel.bulkDelete(deleteNumber);}
description: purge
Purge is a command to delete a certain number of message. To use it, you need to give a number between 1 and 100 after the word `purge`

commands: exports.rate = (message, settings, list, bot, botconfig) =>  {let rated = message.mentions.members.first();if (rated) {rated = rated.user;let bool = false;botconfig.admins.forEach(id => {if (id == rated.id) bool = true;});if (bool) return message.channel.send(`I'd give **__${rated.username}__** an easy 11/10`);if (rated.id == message.author.id) return message.channel.send(`**${rated.username}**, I'd give you 0/10! Booooooooh `);let rate = Math.floor((Math.random() * 11));let phrases = ["barely a", "an easy", "largely a", "just a", "almost a", "easily a", "maybe a", "a total"];let phrase = phrases[Math.floor((Math.random() * phrases.length))];return message.channel.send(`I'd give **__${rated.username}__** ${phrase} ${rate}/10`);};rated = message.content.split(" ").splice(1).join(" ");if (rated) {let rate = Math.floor((Math.random() * 11));let phrases = ["barely a", "an easy", "largely a", "just a", "almost a", "easily a", "maybe a", "a total"];let phrase = phrases[Math.floor((Math.random() * phrases.length))];return message.channel.send(`I'd give **__${rated}__** ${phrase} ${rate}/10`);};return message.channel.send(`But, **${message.author.username}**, I would never dare rate you. I'm not that mean.`);}

exports.joke = (message, settings, list, bot, botconfig) => {let args = message.content.toLowerCase().split(" ");if (args.length != 1) {switch (args[1]) {case 'mum':case 'mom':case 'mama':case 'yomamma':case 'madre':case 'maman':case 'mere':case 'mère':const yoMamma = require('yo-mamma').default;let insult = yoMamma();message.channel.send(insult);break;case 'geek':case 'informatique':case 'it':case 'tech':case 'techno':case 'computer':let geekjokes = ["What is the difference between an aircon and a computer?

||None, both stop working when you open windows||","There is 10 types of people in the world : 
Those who can count in binary and those who can't","What does a proud computer call his little son?

||A microchip off the old block.||","Why is beer never served at a math party?

||Because you can't drink and derive.||","How can you tell if a computer geek is an extrovert?

||They stare at your shoes when you talk instead of their own.||","What is the IT paradox?

||The warmer a computer becomes, the more it freezes.||","A programmer gets shopping instructions from his wife: Go buy a cauliflower. If they have oranges, get two dozens. He comes home with 24 cauliflowers.","A web designer is filling out a form:
Age: 31
Height: 5’9”
Eye color: #008000","If it weren’t for C, we’d all be programming in BASI and OBOL","An SQL statement walks into a bar and sees two tables. It approaches, and asks “may I join you?”","Why is it that programmers always confuse Halloween with Christmas?

||Because 31 OCT = 25 DEC.||","Two strings walk into a bar and sit down. The bartender says, “So what’ll it be?”nThe first string says, “I think I’ll have a beer quag fulk boorg jdk^CjfdLk jk3s d#f67howe%^U r89nvy~~owmc63^Dz x.xvcu”
“Please excuse my friend,” the second string says. “He isn’t null-terminated.”","A logician tells a colleague his wife just had a baby.
Is it a boy or a girl?
Yes.","What is the biggest lie in the entire universe?

||“I have read and agree to the Terms and Conditions.”||","The programmer got stuck in the shower because the instructions on the shampoo bottle said: Lather, Rinse, Repeat.","A programmer’s wife tells him, “While you’re at the grocery store, buy some eggs.” 
Since, he never came back.","In a world without fences and walls, who needs Gates and Windows?","Bugs come in through open Windows.","Windows isn’t a virus, viruses do something.","Mac users swear by their Mac, PC users swear at their PC.","Penguins love cold, they won't survive the sun.","If at first you don’t succeed; call it version 1.0.","I would love to change the world, but they won’t give me the source code.","Programming today is a race between software engineers striving to build bigger and better idiot-proof programs, and the Universe trying to produce bigger and better idiots. So far, the Universe is winning.","The more I C, the less I see.","My attitude isn’t bad. It’s in beta.","Programmers are tools for converting caffeine into code.","My software never has bugs. It just develops random features."];let arrlength = geekjokes.length;message.channel.send(geekjokes[Math.floor(Math.random() * arrlength)]);break;default:let jokes = ["What is the best thing about Switzerland?

||I don't know, but the flag is a big plus||","I invented a new word !!!
Plagiarism!","Did you heard about the mathematician who's afraid of negative numbers?
He'll stop at nothing to avoid them","A woman in labor suddenly shout, "Shouldn't! Couldn't! Didn't! Wouldn't! Can't!"

"Don't worry", says the Doc."Those are just contraction"","Knock knock
Who's there?
Interrupting cow
Interrupting c-
MOO!","How do you call a fish with no eyes?

||A fsh||","What do you call a can opener that doesn't work?

||A can't opener||"];let arrlength = jokes.length;message.channel.send(jokes[Math.floor(Math.random() * arrlength)]);break;}}else {let jokes = ["What is the best thing about Switzerland?

||I don't know, but the flag is a big plus||","I invented a new word !!!
Plagiarism!","Did you heard about the mathematician who's afraid of negative numbers?
He'll stop at nothing to avoid them","A woman in labor suddenly shout, "Shouldn't! Couldn't! Didn't! Wouldn't! Can't!"

"Don't worry", says the Doc."Those are just contraction"","Knock knock
Who's there?
Interrupting cow
Interrupting c-
MOO!","How do you call a fish with no eyes?

||A fsh||","What do you call a can opener that doesn't work?

||A can't opener||"];let arrlength = jokes.length;message.channel.send(jokes[Math.floor(Math.random() * arrlength)]);}}
description: rate
Rate is a command to rate someone or something. Mention someone to rate him/her, write something after `rate`. If you give no argument, it will just rate you.
joke
Joke is a simple command to get jokes. If you want to get geek jokes or mama jokes, just type `mama` or `geek` after the joke word.

commands: exports.dice = (message, settings, list, bot, botconfig) => {let arg = message.content.toLowerCase().split(" ");if (arg[1]) {let args = arg[1].split("d");if (args.length == 2) {if (!args[0].isNaN() && !args[1].isNaN()) {let transitNum = parseInt(args[0]);let transitDice = parseInt(args[1]);if (transitDice > 1 && transitDice < 101 && transitNum > 0 && transitNum < 21) {if (transitNum == 1) return message.channel.send( `You rolled a .... ${Math.floor(Math.random() * transitDice) + 1}`)let resultArr = [];for (let i = 0; i < transitNum; i++) resultArr.push(Math.floor(Math.random() * transitDice) + 1);let result = resultArr.splice(0, transitNum - 1).join(", ").concat(" and ", resultArr[resultArr.length - 1]);return message.channel.send("You rolled a " + result);}else return message.channel.send("Sorry, your dice should be of maximum 100, and you should throw maximum 20 dices at a time");}else  return message.channel.send("Please enter numbers around your `d`");}else return message.channel.send("The description of your dice should look like `XdY`, where X and Y are positive numbers.")}else return message.channel.send( `You rolled a .... ${Math.floor(Math.random() * 6) + 1}`);}
description: dice
Dice is a command to throw a dice. If you don't want a dice of 6, just type XdY after the word `dice`, where X is the number of dices you want to throw, and Y the number of faces of one dice

commands: exports.morse = (message, settings, list, bot, botconfig) => {let args = message.content.split(" ").splice(1);if (!args.length) return message.channel.send('Please enter a message to encode. Otherwise, it\'s useless');let alpha = " ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ1234567890".split(""),morse = "/,.-,-...,-.-.,-..,.,..-.,--.,....,..,.---,-.-,.-..,--,-.,---,.--.,--.-,.-.,...,-,..-,...-,.--,-..-,-.--,--..,.----,..---,...--,....-,.....,-....,--...,---..,----.,-----".split(","),text = args.join(" ").toUpperCase();while (text.includes("Ä") || text.includes("Ö") || text.includes("Ü")) {text = text.replace("Ä","AE").replace("Ö","OE").replace("Ü","UE");}if (text.startsWith(".") || text.startsWith("-")) {text = text.split(" ");let length = text.length;for (i = 0; i < length; i++) {text[i] = alpha[morse.indexOf(text[i])];}text = text.join("");} else {text = text.split("");let length = text.length;for (i = 0; i < length; i++) {text [i] = morse[alpha.indexOf(text[i])];}text = text.join(" ");}return message.channel.send("```"+text+"```");}

exports.flip = (message, settings, list, bot, botconfig) => {const mapping = '¡"#$%⅋,)(*+\'-˙/0ƖᄅƐㄣϛ9ㄥ86:;<=>?@∀qƆpƎℲפHIſʞ˥WNOԀQɹS┴∩ΛMX⅄Z[/]^_`ɐqɔpǝɟƃɥᴉɾʞlɯuodbɹsʇnʌʍxʎz{|}~';const OFFSET = '!'.charCodeAt(0);let args = message.content.split(" ").splice(1);if (args.length < 1) return message.channel.send("You must provide text to flip!");message.channel.send(args.join(' ').split('').map(c => c.charCodeAt(0) - OFFSET).map(c => mapping[c] || ' ').reverse().join(''));}
description: morse
Morse is a command that simply traduce the message you put after the word `morse` in morse.
flip
Flip is a command to flip your text. Just type in `flip`with the text to flip after, to flip it.

commands: exports.help = (message, settings, list, bot, config) => {let text = message.content.split('').splice(settings.prefix.length).join('').split(' ');let embed = new Discord.RichEmbed().setColor(8212195);if (text[1]) {let abool = -1;list.forEach((bin, i) => {if (bin[0] == text[1]) abool = i});if (abool != -1) {embed.setTitle(`${settings.prefix}${list[abool][0]} - Description :`).setDescription(list[abool][1]);return message.channel.send(embed);};};let liststr = [];list.forEach(cmd => {liststr.push(cmd[0]);});embed.setTitle('List of all available commands on this server :').setFooter(`The prefix of this server is ${settings.prefix}`).setDescription(liststr.join(', ')).addField('How to get more specific infos?', `Just write \`${settings.prefix}${text[0]} [The question you want to know more about]\``);message.channel.send(embed)};
exports.sorry = (message, prefix) => {message.channel.send(`I'm sorry, but I don't know this command. YOu can always write ${prefix}help to see the command list`)}

exports.invite = (message, settings, list, bot, botconfig) => {message.channel.send('Here is a link to invite me in any server :smile:
https://discordapp.com/oauth2/authorize?client_id=592760920648712192&scope=bot&permissions=2146958847')}
description: help
Help is a commande to get help on a command. I f you want more help on a specific command, just type `help` followwed by the name of the command that intrigued you.
invite
Use this command to get an invite link for this server
